title: How about gender bender skins?
body:
Riot made a lot of great skins for their characters and invented chromas to allow people enjoy experience with game even more than before. I saw on Deviantart or other websites tributes to their work shown in art. Also I noticed that people very often play with art by picturing their favorite characters as different genders. It looks super funny so I wonder what Riot would think about this idea. What about making gender bender skins for some characters? Also what do you - players - think about it? Would you like skins like that? Which characters would you like to see as different genders?

I think that people could like gender bender skins because it would be funny, ridiculous or on the other hand interesting and different. Can you image female Garen? The big, muscular lady with square jaw and short girly skirt? Or super hot and sexy male Ahri? Or old granny Zilean rushing with her walking frame and putting on heads of enemies explosive applepies, mugs of hot chocolate or what grannies usually like to make? I bet Wawrick would love to eat her.

What do you think?


https://i.pinimg.com/originals/37/f1/89/37f189c1340e503d64e152fd60c24f98.jpg
(The picture of lady Twisted Face is from https://monorirogue.deviantart.com )

replies.body: Every gender bender skin would require new voice work, so would at minimum be priced at Legendary tier (1,820 RP). You have my full support, however.
I'm imagining a male {{champion:127}} and all I can see is abs. Beautiful, beautiful abs.
{{champion:6}} {{champion:79}}

YES PLEASE!
{{champion:36}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:516}} {{champion:201}}
I'd imagine Gragas would be just as full of alcohol as he is now.

Gender is a fine line nowadays. I think Riot would rather avoid the impending shitstorm a gender bender skin would bring. 

It would be a funny idea though.

I didn't think about it. I heard about political correctness problem in countries of the west, but I didn't think it's issue affecting fields it shouldn't affect (like games). But I guess you could be right.

I also just thought it would be funny idea. I saw pictures of some really hot gender bender characters and I thought it would be brilliant as a skin.
Mister Fortune
Do you have a hidden agenda?
I don't. Also I'm not sure what hidden agenda could I have.

I see your below post. If you just think it is interesting that is fine.

But see below. It requires a lot of work, new model and voices, etc.
But moreso, there are oother hreads like these. And some of them are fueled by polotical agendas. Trying to normalize politics and such. And there is no room for that in my game.

Yes, I guess it's a lot of work, but probably not much less than require some of new skins in game.

About politics. I wonder why political agenda would like some gender bender skins in the game. I mean it's obvious that people don't need to associate themselves with characters in LoL by gender, they like characters in the game NOT because of gender but because they are funny or cool or super dark and evil or cute or anything they like and gender bender character main strenght is just being funny or interesting. I think that being prisoner of agenda is not only letting it dictate what you have to think but also not allowing yourself thinking freely about things even in some distant way connected to agenda. Not allowing yourself being creative because it has something similar to somebody's agenda.

You know, I just had an idea and I shared it. It would be great to think about it without any background, but I can understand that people in US or other countries are hypersensitive about gender stuff. I already started to lose hope this idea can succeed.
GROSS
Sort of a drag version of the "Definitely not" series...
As long as we get hot guy versions of champs like {{champion:143}} and {{champion:28}}, I am ALL for this idea.
just thinking about a male Evelynn OH GAWDDDD rule 34 xD
Getting tired of this... champs are made to be a specific gender. If you dont like it then go play skyrim and change your gender all you want

I have to agree this type of thread gets tiresome after a while. Every month it's the same thing over and over ever since League of Legends started. And just about every time it's been down voted sometimes into the -100's. I do appreciate the determination but somethings shouldn't happen.

I didn't know. I'm quite new here.

But if the topic is returning every month, doesn't it means that people really do want those kind of skins?
They're usually posted by the same 2 or 3 Summoners and don't last a week on the front page

If you don't like it, don't join the thread ;P
Although some champs, like Vel'Koz, shouldn't be changed.
You guys are remaking it every month, even if you get denied.
Then why comment each month you dont like it? Let them have their little section to think of it.

I didn't mean to rework every character in game to have two genders and I don't think it would be good idea. I thought about making gender bender skins only for some few characters to make it funny or interesting or super sexy - in some way very unique.
Its not unique or funny or sexy...

The linked artwork is really good!

And also it's probably not going to happen - even assuming models weren't an issue, you'd need a different VO for the champion. That would suck. With different models, animations, and VOs, you're recreating a champion just for a skin. Not even remotely profitable for the amount of time spent.

Which is too bad, it'd be interesting to see some of these gender flips.
I'd love to see these but what would we do to ez?

Riot has touched on this before, they do not want skins that change the theme of a champion. To use your picture, Twisted fate would go from sly playboy to thieving seductress, and that is not guaranteed to resonate with the Twisted fate mains, equaling a poor Riot Games.

Riot said they won't do that because they'd have to build a new champion really. They'd have to have new animations and such due to the fact that men and women move differently.  Plus, it'd add more confusion to people as Riot loves their "clarity" so they don't want to change the feeling of the champions.

I'd rather not touch the topic.
I have a couple transgender friends who've stated distaste for genderbending characters; they find it offensive.
